'''Beware of Angry Dog''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat a roaring [[Rifthound]].

==Notes==
* Rifthounds only roar when there are [[Rifthound Whelps]] around.
